topic.title: Feasible Ways to Determine the Boss
topic.body:
'''Feasible Ways to Determine the Boss''':

There are various feasible ways for ordinary people to eliminate the boss.


Possible countermeasures for bosses (including future bosses):
â– Your Majesty (including your future Majesty), why is it against Ye
â– surrender
â– Exile
â– Part or all of the above, others


If ordinary people follow strategies such as repeaters (refer to [[Game]]: The Evolution of Trust) and take revenge on the boss, can the boss bear it?


Network encyclopedia administrators are also librarians;

This article belongs to'"The Librarian's Fury"' (Si Shu's Fury).

==Light aiming method==
Synonyms of Guangjue:
â– Focus, focus, focus, fire, light punishment, scolding, shouting, shouting, etc.
===Mirror array focus moving target aiming method===
According to the legend of Archimedes' mirror array, I remember the mirror in the book flashing for help and aiming at the air.

Some conditions that limit power:

Weather, mirror reflectivity, total reflective area of â€‹â€‹the mirror array, reflection angle, target absorption rate, etc.;

The flat mirror array focuses sunlight, with low hard killing efficiency and high soft killing efficiency.

Conditions for aerial flashing:

Daylight, airplane flying by, double-sided plane mirror with front sight, etc.;

There is a front sight (can be in the center, side, corner, etc.) of the double-sided plane mirror:
â– Wood, ice, mud, sand, stone, gold, etc., handmade
â– â– Melting, float mirror
â– â– 2 mutual grinding mirrors
â–  2 single-sided plane mirror, 1 front sight, etc., manual
â– 1 double-sided plane mirror, 1 front sight, etc., handmade
â– 1 with front sight double-sided flat mirror
â– â– Double-sided CD, etc.
â– Part or all of the above, others

operating:

Keep a three-point and one-line virtual image of a certain eye, front sight, and mirror front sight,

Aim this line at the porthole of the aircraft cockpit;

Light path:

ï¼|ï¼œ

Send out SOS flashing distress signal with three short, three long and three short:

...---...


Mirror aiming:
â– Focus on single target
â– â– Priority consensus on focus position (target pupil, lens, brain, computer, etc.)
â–  Focus on similar multiple targets successively
â– â– Using a larger hollow star-shaped command mirror (composed of small colorless mirrors, small colored mirrors, stained large mirrors, etc.),
::Ordinary mirror aim at the center of the spot of the command mirror
â– â– Aim at the highest level of death
â– â– Aim at the brightest target
â– Part or all of the above, others
===Other light source aiming methods===
Flashlight, laser pointer, laser artificial eye, gimbal laser communication module, magnetic levitation laser communication module, phased array laser communication module, etc., aiming method:
â– Front sight, sight, beam splitter sight, binocular sight, gimbal telescope, etc.
â– Single camera beam splitter sight, dual camera sight, gimbal single camera astronomical telescope, etc.
â– Gimbal lidar, magnetic levitation lidar, phased array lidar, etc.
â– Part or all of the above, others
==Calculation==
data:
â– The mass of the boss's headâ‰ˆ4kg
â– 1kg water heating up 1â„ƒ energyâ‰ˆ4.2E3J
â– The boss's head heats up to 63 (100-37) â„ƒ energy â‰ˆ 1.06E6J
â– Solar constant (including invisible light)â‰ˆ1.36E3JÃ—m^-2Ã—s^-1
â– The boss's head boils for 1 second (less or more), and the total area of â€‹â€‹direct sunlight â‰ˆ7.78E2m^2
â– The total area of â€‹â€‹the mirror arrayâ‰ˆ7.78E2m^2Ã—2^0.5â‰ˆ1.1E3m^2
â– Number of peopleâ‰ˆ1E3 to 1E6, maybe â‰ˆ1E4
â–  Boss absorbance (may be water-cooled reflective firefighting clothing, etc., may not be considered as the highest level of death-finding target) â‰ˆ1 to 1E-3, may â‰ˆ0.1
â–  Boss absorbance 1, average mirror surface â‰ˆ1.1m^2 to 11cm^2, possibly â‰ˆ11dm^2
â– Per capita mirror surfaceâ‰ˆ1.1E3m^2 to 11cm^2, maybe â‰ˆ1.1m^2â‰ˆ2m^2
â–  Boss absorbance may be â‰ˆ0.1, per capita power may be â‰ˆ2.7E3JÃ—s^-1â‰ˆ3E3JÃ—s^-1â‰ˆ3E3W

About 10,000 people, 1 leader with a head mass of about 4 kilograms, single equipment:
â– Approximately 2 square meters with front sight double-sided plane mirror, direct sunlight, the distance of the heliosphere is about 1 astronomical unit
â– Power is not less than 3 kW and easy to aim, flashlight, laser pointer, etc.
â– Part or all of the above, others

[[Category:War]]

topic.title: Quiet the topic as soon as you speak
topic.body:
'''Quiet the topic as soon as you speak''' is a political joke found on the Internet.

The chef gathered the chickens, ducks, fish, cattle, sheep and pigs, and said enthusiastically: "Today we fully promote democracy, do you talk about how you like to be eaten by others?"

Nobody said anything.

Only the cow was cautious and hesitated.

Chef: "Go ahead, don't be restrained, to promote democracy is to speak freely!"

So the cow said: "In fact, we don't want to be eaten by anyone!"

The chef smiled and said: "Look at you, you digress as soon as you speak..."

[[Category:Politics]]

topic.title: Biography of Negro 1
topic.body:
'''Biography of Negro 1''' modified from Marcus family (modified from Chen She family).

==Content==

Negro 1, is a native of New York, nicknamed A. Negro 2, is a native of District 2 of New York, nicknamed B. After graduating from high school, the black 1 worked in a department store. One day, he sighed and said to other employees: "If anyone gets rich first, don't forget to get rich later." Other employees laughed at him: "We are all workers, how can we be rich? What?" Negro 1 sighed: "How does the red-winged blackbird know the ambition of the bald eagle?"

In 2020, the earth's new crown pneumonia pandemic. Hundreds of black people crowded in the slums of New York's 3rd District. Black 1 and Black 2 were their community leaders. Because of the epidemic, the places where part-time jobs are closed, there is no money to pay the rent, and the landlord will be rushed to the street if they cannot pay the rent. Black 1 and Black 2 posted on the Internet: "Now if you start to work, you will die of illness, and you will starve to death if you don't go to work. It's all death. You die for the American people, can you?"

Negro 1 said: "The American people have endured the oppression of the deep government for a long time. I heard that the current Trump administration came to power by deceit, which is unpopular. The former President Obama and Senator Sanders are good people, and the people say they are Very wise. Some people say they are capitalist reformers, and some people say they are socialists. Today we call on the people in the name of the Democratic Left, and there must be many people responding.â€ Black 2 thinks Black 1 is right. Just go to the community pastor. The community pastor knew their purpose and said, "Your method is feasible. But have you asked God?" Black 1 was very happy and said, "This is for us to get some liberation theology first." So they just said Posting: "Jesus is black", and let Negro 2 rap in the alley on the side of the street. The lyrics are "It is not that the people are afraid of the deep government, but the deep government is afraid of the people." The deep-seated government of the United States was very frightened and has been pretending to observe two people.

Black 1 and Black 2 have many online fans. One day Trump was ruling the country on the Internet again, and they went to match Trumpâ€™s fans. Some Sichuan fans were very angry, and they took out the banner of the Southern Slave State Alliance and ultra-nationalism and called for America to be great again. Black 1 and Blacks 2 Just hang up their posts and these Sichuan fans will die socially. So the two people convened the anti-extremist nationalist alliance and said: "Now Trump wants to make the United States great again, that is, whether we choose to starve to death at work or to die at work. If the producer can live, even if he can't live, he will have to do great things. To be famous, everything in the United States is created by the producers. Is the authority of the deep government approved by the majority of producers?" Everyone said, "We will do it with you!" So they pretended that they were helping the Democratic left in the 2020 election. Down with Trump, uprising in the state 1. In the beginning, only a few people in the communities were in uprising, and now the whole United States is in uprising.

[[Category: Politics]]

topic.title: Which task is more difficult to capture more than 50,000 ordinary adult riot police and ordinary adult domestic pigs?
topic.body:
https://uncyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/%E6%8F%90%E5%89%8D%E5%8A%9D%E9%99%8D%E7%8C%AA%E3%80%81%E4%BA%BA

https://uncyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E6%89%BE%E6%AD%BB%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E5%BD%93%E9%9D%A2%E6%8F%90%E9%97%AE

==Suspected of insulting the army, riot police, pigs, people==
[[Advise pigs and people in advance]]
* In the Battle of Laiwu, the communist army, civilians, and national army, except for people and personal clothing, and the number and position of the national army or pig army, remain as unchanged as possible. The time limit is three days. Which of the following tasks is more difficult? (More than 50,000 people were wiped out in three days, that is, 50,000 pigs were released for the Communists to catch, and they could not be caught in three days.)
**Destroy more than 50,000 ordinary adult national troops (communist army, civilians, national army, etc., unlimited battle death rate)
** More than 50,000 ordinary adult domestic pigs were captured alive (the Communist army, civilians, pig army, etc., the total battle death rate is less than 0.01)
* Which task is more difficult to capture more than 50,000 ordinary adult riot police and ordinary adult domestic pigs?

topic.title: The civilians catch the riot police battle
topic.body:
'''The civilians catch the riot police battle''' is modified from the [[Advance to persuade pigs, people]] to catch pigs.
==Suspected milk army, police, pig, human==
[[Advise pigs and people in advance]]

[[Civilians are captured alive in riot police battle]]
* In the Battle of Laiwu, the communist army, civilians, and national army, except for people and personal clothing, and the number and position of the national army or pig army, remain as unchanged as possible. The time limit is three days. Which of the following tasks is more difficult? (More than 50,000 people were wiped out in three days, that is, 50,000 pigs were released for the Communists to catch, and they could not be caught in three days.)
**Destroy more than 50,000 ordinary adult national troops (communist army, civilians, national army, etc., unlimited battle fatalities)
** More than 50,000 ordinary adult domestic pigs were captured alive (the Communist army, civilians, pig army, etc., the total battle death rate is less than 0.01)
* Which task is more difficult to capture more than 50,000 ordinary adult riot police and ordinary adult domestic pigs?
==Catch the police war==
The more active civilians mobilize the more passive civilians, using simple tools (compulsory requisition from nearby, you can leave IOUs) organized arrest of police.

Use various methods to persuade surrender in advance;

Use more active civilians to improve organization;

Grasp the police master to command, the skilled and the novice;

Use laser pointers, flashlights, searchlights, double-sided flat mirrors with front sight (direct sunlight, searchlights, etc.), speakers, propaganda paper tubes, temporary musical instruments (including pots and pans, etc.), bamboo and wood double-headed spears (if the police rush over, then The spear is inserted into the ground and the other is pointed at the police head), shields, thick raincoats with multi-layer plastic wrap, thick charcoal masks, gas masks, helmets, etc.

Use all kinds of anonymous masks, food, drinks, ordinary toys, sex toys, sex drugs, gems, precious metals, coins, banknotes, etc. thrown on the road, and bait that ordinary retired riot police cannot buy all;

Set up and promote masked group sex banquets that ordinary retired riot police cannot afford,

For banquets, there are bait, condoms, safety underwear, safety all-inclusive underwear, various sex workers wearing erotic clothing (sexual clothing that is more erotic than naked sex clothing) (can be hired by bait), banquet civilians, physical examination tools, medical tools, and medical treatment Personnel (can be hired by bait), etc.;

They are treated differently according to the degree of police cooperation, from no restriction to temporary suicide prevention;

After the war, reward and punished according to merits and demerits.

[[Category:War]]
